attributes.action: British population vote of no confidence in Boris Johnson
attributes.additional_details:
Time and time again this government led by Boris Johnson has failed in hearing what the public want and providing what we need.

Closing pubs and bars in areas and offering only 2/3 of what is already minimum wage is just another example as well as the now likely no deal Brexit, covid 19 handling, NHS privatisation, pay and outsourcing and free school meals for children in poverty!
attributes.background: Vote of no confidence in Boris Johnson, after multiple failings and U-turns in areas such as Brexit, the dealing of the covid-19 pandemic, NHS pay rise and Free school meals for children.

rejection.details:
We can't publish petitions about honours or appointments. That includes calling for Ministers to be sacked or to resign, or for a vote of no confidence.

If you're concerned about a particular policy or decision that's the responsibility of Government or the House of Commons, you could sign or start a petition about that.
